author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

In a recent financial call, CD Projekt may have revealed its release plans for the next Witcher trilogy. The Witcher 4 is currently in development with no definitive release date, but CD Projekt wants The Witcher 5 and 6 to follow closely behind, with the goal of releasing those next three games within a 6-year window. Developer CD Projekt RED is not known for rushing its game releases, but the team attributes Unreal Engine 5 as helping to speed up their process. In other news, a new leak of development footage from Grand Theft Auto 6 has hit the internet, before quickly being scrubbed by Rockstar Games. However, the new footage didn't reveal much, just some animation tests and near-confirmation that a bike rental service will be included in the game. Exciting. And finally, IO Interactive has its hands full with 007: First Light, but it will return to the Hitman universe with the brand-new Hitman 4 some time in the future.

#TheWitcher #Gaming #IGN
title: The Witcher 4, 5 and 6 Release Plans Revealed By CD Projekt Red - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Hive Scum Class Release Date Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, a team-based co-op action shooter developed by Fatshark. title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Official Hive Scum Class Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Dark Craft trailer for this upcoming MMORPG Souls-like game. In Dark Craft, explore an open world filled with ruined castles, forgotten temples, and enemies waiting for their prey. Play solo or with friends, hunt bosses, join guilds, fight other players, and prove your right to reign supreme. Dark Craft will be available on PC.
title: Dark Craft - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'All I Have Is My Faith' Clip for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Take a look at an emotionally loaded conversation on how to respond to calamity, despair, and what remains through it all. Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lan
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official 'All I Have Is My Faith' Clip (2025) Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 10th Anniversary Celebration Trailer for Rainbow Six Siege, the hit first-person tactical shooter developed by Ubisoft. Players can get a trip down memory lane at the evolution of the hit title, from the humble beginnings in 2015, to the seminal update with Rainbow Six Siege X, and all of the updates in between. Rainbow Six Siege is available now for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC.

author: IGN
description:
High On Life 2 is our IGN First for December, and we're kicking things off with a peek into the world of this upcoming action-adventure FPS sequel to the 2022 game. Watch the surreal new High On Life 2 teaser trailer to learn more about the mysterious in-game drug, Humanzapro. High on Life 2 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on February 13, 2026. It will also be available on Xbox Game Pass upon release. Pre-orders for High On Life 2 are now open on Xbox, PlayStation, and PC. You can learn more about it here if you're interested: https://squanchgames.com/high-on-life-2/

The latest High on Life 2 teaser trailer is presented in the form of a pharma-style commercial, where in-game conglomerate Rhea Pharmaceuticals advertises Humanzapro, the company’s powerful drug created from human life.

You’ve done it. You’ve taken down an intergalactic cartel, brought humanity back from the brink of extinction, and hunted dangerous bounties to the far corners of the ga
title: High on Life 2 - Official Humanzapro Pharma Teaser Trailer - IGN First

author: IGN
description:

Marvel Cosmic Invasion is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MarvelCosmicInvasion #MarvelGames

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Cinematic Trailer for Destiny 2: Renegades, a Star Wars-inspired expansion for the hit free-to-play MMO first-person RPG shooter developed by Bungie.

description:
Check out gameplay from the latest throwback '90s beat-em-up, Marvel Cosmic Invasion featuring Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine, and Captain America. 

Marvel Cosmic Invasion is an action-packed, 2D arcade-style beat ’em up, calling back to the original '90s brawlers with a modernized dynamic tag-team fighting and a pixel art style that embodies classic MARVEL character designs. 

Gameplay captured on a PS5

#IGN #MarvelCosmicInvasion #BeatEmUp

author: IGN
description:
Don't Stop, Girlypop! gets an action-packed new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the latest Don't Stop, Girlypop! trailer for this upcoming Y2K arena movement shooter game, where standing still is not an option. 

In Don't Stop, Girlypop!, the faster you go, the more damage you deal and the more you heal. Don't Stop, Girlypop! will be available on PC via Steam on January 29, 2026.

title: Don't Stop, Girlypop! - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Marvel Cosmic Invasion reviewed by Will Borger on PlayStation 5, also available on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2.

The stages themselves aren’t going to blow you away and I wish there was a more varied rogues’ gallery to smack down, but Marvel Cosmic Invasion’s tag team action has the juice, and it’s a joy to dig into each character’s kit, especially in co-op. 

I don’t think it’s a great beat ‘em up, but it is a very good one that I’m looking forward to playing again in the years to come, and it highlights some of the more obscure (and fun) parts of Marvel’s history. If you’re not already into the genre, I doubt Cosmic Invasion will change your mind, but it’s good enough to get my Avengers assembled on a lazy Sunday, kick back, and pop some baddies in the mouth.

#IGN #MarvelCosmicInvasion #MarvelGames
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Review

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay and more from Gang of Frogs in this action-packed new trailer for the upcoming 1-4 player co-op roguelite shooter game with deckbuilding mechanics, set in a 'Historical Cyberpunk' world. 

In Gang of Frogs, you command a crew of outlaw frogs sailing through space, battling hordes of monstrous bugs and space crabs. Gang of Frogs will be available on PC, and a Steam Playtest runs from December 5 to December 12, 2025. You can learn more and sign up here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3081510/Gang_of_Frogs/

#IGN #GangsOfFrogs #Roguelite
title: Gang of Frogs - Official Steam Playtest Announce Trailer

author: IGN

#IGN #Hitman #Eminem
